block.p: DONO-Maryann, GOING-Mary Ann, MOLLICK-KELLY-Kathleen, WALSH-Joan Ellen. The Medical Staff of St. Vincent's Hospital and Medical Center of New York mourns the loss of four invaluable members of the Saint Vincent's family. They were longstanding members of our Nursing Staff who devoted their lives and careers to the ministries of healing and teaching at St. Vincent's. They are irreplaceable and their loss is immeasurable. Collectively, they leave behind an indelible legacy of compassion and dedication to our patients and their families. Individually, they will long remain in our hearts and minds. We extend our condolences to the families of these exemplary caregivers and will keep them in our prayers. Joseph M. Jabbour, MD, FACS President, the Medical Staff of St. Vincent's Hospital and Medical Center of New York

DONO-Maryann, GOING-Mary Ann, MOLLICK-KELLY-Kathleen, WALSH, Joan. The Doctors Alumni Association of St. Vincent's Hospital records with sorrow the untimely death of our friends and colleagues. We extend our deepest sympathy to their families. They will be missed. Robert J. Furey, M.D., Pres. St Vincents Dr's Alumni Assn
